name: Froggero
description:
A 2D platformer with with a turn based combat system. 

The main jist of the game is the switch from platformer to turn based combat system. By pressing a button when next to an enemy you can fight him in a "focus mode", otherwise you can fight them normally, you get to choose, but be careful because some enemies are easier to fight normally while others are not.

This game was made by  a team of 6 students from CMGT Saxion.
